name: Business Card Template
description:
Design one business ❖ Card and let Figma do the work for you to rapidly create 10 business cards per page.


What's Included:

  • 10-up card template at 8.5 x 11 inches
  • Tic marks for easy trimming
  • Full bleed option for colored cards
  • Safe zone guides
  • ❖ Card applies design to all 10 cards instantly
  • Basic usage guidelines and tips.
